title: godoc: document -template flag to specify custom templates
body:
great "new" flag but I can not find it on http://weekly.golang.org/cmd/godoc/

diff -r 780c85032b17 src/cmd/godoc/doc.go
--- a/src/cmd/godoc/doc.go	Wed Nov 02 12:00:13 2011 +0900
+++ b/src/cmd/godoc/doc.go	Thu Nov 10 17:24:07 2011 +0100
@@ -47,6 +47,11 @@
 		width of tabs in units of spaces
 	-timestamps=true
 		show timestamps with directory listings
+		
+	-template="" 
+		specifying custom templates directory,
+		containing alternate template files
+		
 	-index
 		enable identifier and full text search index
 		(no search box is shown if -index is not set)
